H0.text: what is the average time in hospice care. 30 days

H1.text: what is the average time in hospice care. 120 days

H2.text: what is the average time in hospice care. 90 days

H3.text: what is the average time in hospice care. 57 days

A4.text: Hospice care under the Medicare Hospice Benefit requires documentation from two physicians estimating a person has less than six months to live if the disease follows its usual course.

A5.text: Hospice care targets the terminally ill who are expected to die within six months.
